img.title: HTML5 Bootstrap Ecommerce Theme for Furniture Industry

a.t-att-data-default-lang: editable and 'true' if lg[0] == website.default_lang_code else None

img.title: HTML5 Bootstrap Ecommerce Theme for Furniture Industry

div.class: mini-cart-content dropdown-content left-hand block block-cart skip-content skip-content--style

img.alt: HTML5 Bootstrap Ecommerce Theme for Furniture Industry
img.title: HTML5 Bootstrap Ecommerce Theme for Furniture Industry

xpath.attribute: container mt8 product-view oe_website_sale #{(compute_currency(product.lst_price) - product.price) > 0.1 and 'discount'}

a.t-att-href: keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))

div.t-att-class: '%s' % product.product_style_tag_id.color if product and product.product_style_tag_id else ''

a.t-att-href: keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))

ul.class: nav nav-pills nav-stacked mt16 category_nav mb16

label.t-attf-class: css_attribute_color #{'active' if v.id in attrib_set else ''}

li.t-att-class: 'li-mega-menu mm_icon' if submenu.menu_icon and submenu.menu_icon_image else 'li-mega-menu'

ul.t-att-style: 'background: url(data:image/png;base64,%s); background-size: cover;' % (submenu.megamenu_bg_image) if submenu.megamenu_bg and submenu.megamenu_bg_img_color == 'bg_img' else '' 'background: %s !important;' % (submenu.megamenu_bg_color) if submenu.megamenu_bg and submenu.megamenu_bg_img_color == 'bg_color' else ''

t.li: Still, No category assigned to this menu.!!!

div.t-att-style: 'float: %s' % submenu.category_slider_position if submenu.category_slider and submenu.category_slider_position else 'float:left;'

div.t-att-class: 'col-md-8 col-xs-12 letter-spacing' if submenu.category_slider else 'col-md-12 letter-spacing'

ul.t-att-style: 'background: url(data:image/png;base64,%s); background-size: cover;' % (submenu.megamenu_bg_image) if submenu.megamenu_bg and submenu.megamenu_bg_img_color == 'bg_img' else '' 'background: %s !important;' % (submenu.megamenu_bg_color) if submenu.megamenu_bg and submenu.megamenu_bg_img_color == 'bg_color' else ''
